description:
As of 9 Dec 2021, the decsription just says:
"Finds duplicate, unique, under- or over-replicated files and offers many ways to get rid of them"

The description should be as clear as the one on github that emphasizes "command line utility".

I don't know what it's worth in the CLI. But as a GUI installed from a GUI installer, it is not ok.
summary: It's a command line utility, but the description doesn't mention it..

description:
Fantastic program. It would be way better if it had a GUI. Anyways, it does its purpose and has a lot of utilities.
A tip: if you want to scan removable devices too, try this command ("snap connect fclones:removable-media"). 
I hope it was helpful.
